text: @ScrambledAdams Vronsky's interest in painting and the Middle Ages did not last long, and by the evidence of the wrist watch that is two hours fast.

passages.fragment: Vronsky 's interest in painting and the Middle Ages did not last long
passages.full_quote: <used>Vronsky's interest in painting and the Middle Ages did not last long</used>

passages.fragment: did not last long , and by the
passages.full_quote: The shower <used>did not last long, and by the</used> time Vronsky arrived, his shaft horse trotting at full speed, and dragging the off horses galloping through the mud with their reins hanging loose, the sun had peeped out again, the roofs of the summer villas and the old lime trees in the gardens on both

passages.fragment: , and by the evidence of the wrist watch
passages.full_quote: It is half-past ten when Bella Duveen leaves<used>, and by the evidence of the wrist watch</used> we know that the crime was committed, or at any rate that it was staged, before twelveo'clock

passages.fragment: of the wrist watch that is two hours fast
passages.full_quote: Because <used>of the wrist watch that is two hours fast</used>
